entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Donnacona
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deschambault 5:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -23.9°C
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -30.0°C
Wind: SSW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
